plot outline: Please Naaku Pellaindi is a 2005 Indian Telugu film, directed by Gandhi and Produced by D. Prabhaker. The film stars Rajeev Kanakala, Shruthi, Raghu, Soni Charishma and Venu Madhav in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by K. Vijay.
title: Please Naaku Pellaindi
plot: _Please Naaku Pellaindi_ (qv) is a 2005 Indian Telugu film, directed by Gandhi and Produced by D. Prabhaker. The film stars Rajeev Kanakala, Shruthi, Raghu, Soni Charishma and Venu Madhav in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by K. Vijay.
